content.Bash: bash - prints random entry from http://bash.org
content.Pepa: *bot's name*: *message_to_pepa* - Talk with pepa! (example: "Bashoid: Hi there!")
content.RSS: rss list - list available channels || rss show *channel_name* - sends you log of last messages for that *channel_name*
content.Title: t *url* - shows content of web page's <title> tag
content.Stopwatch: stopwatch start, stopwatch stop, stopwatch get - stopwatch control
content.StopwatchTimer: stopwatch timer *time* *notify_period* - starts timer for *time* and will notify every *notify_period*. rmtimer removes active timer
content.Counter: ++, --, += *num*, -= *num* - change counter value || counter get - get counter value
